snippet: COOPER--Joel J. 10/29/58-04/13/15 In loving memory of my life partner and best friend. You are missed by all and we think of you every day. Love, Paul and Billy 1/3
lead_paragraph: COOPER--Joel J. 10/29/58-04/13/15 In loving memory of my life partner and best friend. You are missed by all and we think of you every day. Love, Paul and Billy 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  COOPER, JOEL J
